Question: This person was born on 8 January 1942 to Frank and Isobel ****.
Hints: In 1999 this person was awarded the Julius Edgar Lilienfeld Prize of the American Physical Society.
Initially, this person radiation was controversial.
Stephen William ****, CH, CBE, FRS, FRSA (born 8 January 1942) is a British theoretical physicist, cosmologist, and author.
